alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Stone, Izard, south central Fulton and southeastern Baxter Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blanchard Springs Campground, or 12 miles northwest of Mountain View, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Melbourne... Horseshoe Bend... Calico Rock... Oxford... Pineville... Franklin... Brandenberg... Wideman... Lone Star... Gorby... Culp... Lacrosse... Blanchard Springs Campground... Lunenburg... Big Flat... Allison... Mt Olive in Izard County... Zion... Violet Hill... Union... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
